name: B. Semifinals
statement:
Two semifinals have just been in the running tournament. Each semifinal
had participants. There are participants advancing to the finals, they
are chosen as follows: from each semifinal, we choose people () who
showed the best result in their semifinals and all other places in the
finals go to the people who haven’t ranked in the top in their semifinal
but got to the of the best among the others.The tournament organizers
hasn’t yet determined the value, so the participants want to know who
else has any chance to get to the finals and who can go home.
